price: 65. En waarlijk jullie kenden degenen onder jullie die de regels van de Sabbath (de zaterdag) overtraden. Wij zeiden tegen hen: “Wees apen, veracht en verworpen.”
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
